zujkomiller.genetic
Class Evolver

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--zujkomiller.genetic.Evolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
EvolutionObservable
public class Evolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements EvolutionObservable

Evolver controls the execution of the genetic algorithm. It implements the EvolutionObservable interface so that classes implementing EvolutionObserver may register themselves with it and be notified when new generations are created and tested for fitness. The Evolver uses a ProducerFactory to find the correct GenerationProducer needed to create each generation. (There are different GenerationProducers for each type of Chromosome.) After a generation has been created, the Evolver passes it to an implementation of the FitnessTester interface which assigns fitness scores to each individual Chromosome in the generation.

Method Detail

setChromosomeType

public void setChromosomeType(short type)
Sets the type of chromosome which will be used. This should be one of the constants defined in this class: LINEAR, LEAF_TREE, or NODE_TREE. A LINEAR chromosome has all of its genes on the same plane, in a sequence. A LEAF_TREE arranges its genes in a tree shape with all of the gene values at the leaves of the tree and no values at the inner nodes. A NODE_TREE arranges its genes in a tree shape with the gene values at all of the nodes including the root and the leaves.

setAlphabetSize

public void setAlphabetSize(short size)
Sets the number of different values a single gene can hold. For instance, if size is 2, then a gene will have either a one or a zero for a value. If the size is 100, then a gene can have a value from zero to ninety-nine.

setDuplicateGenesAllowed

public void setDuplicateGenesAllowed(boolean allowDuplicates)
If the value passed in as a parameter is true, then duplicate genes are allowed in a Chromosome, otherwise duplicate genes will not be allowed. (If duplicates are not allowed, then the size of the maximum number of genes per chromosome can not be greater than the alphabet size.)

setNumOfGenesPerChrom

public void setNumOfGenesPerChrom(short min,
                                  short max)
Sets minimum and maximum number of genes which can exist in any Chromosome. To make fixed-length chromosomes, set min and max to the same number.

setPopulationSize

public void setPopulationSize(short size)
Each generation will have X number of Chromosomes in int where X = the size passed in as a parameter.

setMutationsPerGeneration

public void setMutationsPerGeneration(short numOfMutations)
Sets the number of mutations to create when producing one generation from a parent generation.

setCrossoversPerGeneration

public void setCrossoversPerGeneration(short numOfCrossovers)
Sets the number of crossovers to do when producing one generation from a parent generation.

setNumToReplicate

public void setNumToReplicate(short numToReplicate)
Sets the number of top-fitness-scoreres in each generation to replicate when creating the next generation.

setNumOfTimesToReplicateEach

public void setNumOfTimesToReplicateEach(short numOfTimes)
Sets the number of times to replicate each top-fitness-scorer in each generation when creating the next generation.

setNumOfGenerationsToCreate

public void setNumOfGenerationsToCreate(short numOfGenerations)
This many generations will be produced.

setStopAtScore

public void setStopAtScore(int score)
If this is called, then processing will stop as soon as a Chromosome is created which reaches the score passed in as a parameter.

setDoStopAtScore

public void setDoStopAtScore(boolean doStop)
If this is set to true, then processing will end as soon as a Chromosome is created which has a fitness score greater than or equal to the "stopAtScore" values, otherwise, processing will continue until X number of generations have been run where X = this.numOfGenerations.

setFitnessTester

public void setFitnessTester(FitnessTester tester)
Parameters:
tester - The fitness tester which will be used to provide a fitness score to all Chromosomes created.

getTopScorers

public Chromosome[] getTopScorers()
Specified by:
getTopScorers in interface EvolutionObservable
Returns:
An array of Chromosomes which have each scored the top score which has been achieved so far. These Chromosomes may have been created in different generations.

getTopScore

public int getTopScore()
Specified by:
getTopScore in interface EvolutionObservable
Returns:
The top score that has been achieved by any Chromosome created so far.

getNumberOfGenerationsRun

public int getNumberOfGenerationsRun()
Specified by:
getNumberOfGenerationsRun in interface EvolutionObservable
Returns:
The number of generations which have been run so far.

addEvolutionObserver

public void addEvolutionObserver(EvolutionObserver observer)
Adds an EvolutionObserver to this EvolutionObservable. When a new generation has been created and tested for fitness, the EvolutionObserver passed in as a parameter will be notified.
Specified by:
addEvolutionObserver in interface EvolutionObservable
Parameters:
observer - An EvolutionObserver which wishes to be notified when a generation has been created and tested for fitness.
